scripts.build: mkdir -p artifacts && everdev sol compile -o ./artifacts contracts/Dice.sol
scripts.wrapjs: everdev js wrap ./artifacts/Dice.abi.json && everdev js wrap -o ../../../artifacts/SetcodeMultisigContract.js ./contracts/third_party/multisig2/SetcodeMultisig.abi.json
scripts.test: npm run build && npm run wrapjs && node test.js
